hotelapp

Class HotelData

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelapp.HotelData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HotelDataBuilder, ThreadSafeHotelData

    public class HotelData
extends java.lang.Object
    Class HotelData - a data structure that stores information about hotels and hotel reviews. Allows to quickly lookup a Hotel given the hotel id. (use TreeMap). Allows to efficiently find hotel reviews for a given hotelID (use a TreeMap, where for each hotelId, the value is a TreeSet). Reviews for a given hotel id are sorted by date from most recent to oldest; if the dates are the same, the reviews are sorted by user nickname, and the user nicknames are the same, by the reviewId.

      • addHotel

        public void addHotel(java.lang.String hotelId,
                     java.lang.String hotelName,
                     java.lang.String city,
                     java.lang.String state,
                     java.lang.String streetAddress,
                     double lat,
                     double lon)
        Create a Hotel given the parameters, and add it to the appropriate data structure.
        Parameters:
        hotelId - - the id of the hotel
        hotelName - - the name of the hotel
        city - - the city where the hotel is located
        state - - the state where the hotel is located.
        streetAddress - - the building number and the street
        lat - latitude
        lon - longitude

      • addReview

        public boolean addReview(java.lang.String hotelId,
                         java.lang.String reviewId,
                         int rating,
                         java.lang.String reviewTitle,
                         java.lang.String review,
                         boolean isRecom,
                         java.lang.String date,
                         java.lang.String username)
        Add a new hotel review. Add it to the map (to the TreeSet of reviews for a given key=hotelId).
        Parameters:
        hotelId - - the id of the hotel reviewed
        reviewId - - the id of the review
        rating - - integer rating 1-5.
        reviewTitle - - the title of the review
        review - - text of the review
        isRecom - - whether the user recommends it or not
        date - - date of the review in the format yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss, e.g. "2016-06-29T17:50:37"
        username - - the nickname of the user writing the review.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if unsuccessful because of invalid hotelId, invalid date or rating. Needs to catch and handle the following exceptions: ParseException if the date is invalid InvalidRatingException if the rating is out of range.

      • printToFile

        public void printToFile(java.nio.file.Path filename)
        Save the string representation of the hotel data to the file specified by filename in the following format (see "expectedOutput" in the test folder): an empty line A line of 20 asterisks ******************** on the next line information for each hotel, printed in the format described in the toString method of this class. The hotels in the file should be sorted by hotel ids
        Parameters:
        filename - - Path specifying where to save the output.

      • mergeReviewMapAndSetRating

        public void mergeReviewMapAndSetRating(HotelData data)
        To merge the local review maps into big review map. To set the average rating of each hotel after done the review loading.
        Parameters:
        data - - local hotel data.
